[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Gas Metering] [Integer Overflow in Gas Calculation] When multiplying module size by per-byte gas costs, can integer overflow cause gas charges to wrap around to zero? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Gas Metering] [Gas Meter State Corruption] If DependencyGasMeter::charge_dependency() fails partway through, is the gas meter state left in a corrupted state? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Gas Metering] [Negative Gas Charges] Can any code path result in negative gas charges that increase available gas instead of decreasing it? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Type Loading] [Unbounded Recursion] Can mutually recursive type definitions cause unbounded recursion in type loading, exhausting stack space? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Type Loading] [Cyclic Type Arguments] Can type arguments form cycles (e.g., Struct<Struct<Struct<...>>>) that cause infinite loops during type resolution? (High)
[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Type Loading] [Type Pool Exhaustion] Can attackers create exponentially many unique type instantiations to exhaust the type pool? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Module Storage] [Storage Backend Consistency] If module storage backend is modified during loading, can inconsistent module versions be loaded? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Module Storage] [Module Publishing Race] Can a module be published while it's being loaded by another transaction, causing partial loading of old and new versions? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Module Storage] [Storage Error Handling] If storage backend returns errors (disk full, corruption), are they properly propagated or can they be silently ignored? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Caching] [Cache Size Limits] Are there limits on script cache, layout cache, and module cache sizes, or can unbounded caching cause memory exhaustion? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Caching] [Cache Eviction Safety] If caches use LRU or similar eviction, can attackers force eviction of important cached items to cause expensive recomputation? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Caching] [Cache Coherency] For distributed validators, can cache inconsistencies between nodes cause non-deterministic transaction execution? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Concurrency] [Data Race in Module Access] Both loaders access module_storage through shared reference - can data races occur if storage is not properly synchronized? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Concurrency] [Thread Safety of Caches] Are script and layout caches thread-safe, or can concurrent access cause corrupted cache entries? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Concurrency] [Arc Cloning Safety] When cloning Arc<Module> and Arc<Function>, are reference counts atomically updated to prevent race conditions? (High)
[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Error Handling] [Panic in Loader] Can any loader operation panic rather than returning an error, causing validator crashes? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Error Handling] [Error Amplification] Can small errors in module loading cascade into critical failures that halt transaction execution? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/] [Error Handling] [Error Message Sanitization] Do error messages properly sanitize sensitive information before being exposed to users? (Low)
